text: 5G conspiracy theorists, along with anti-vaxxers and "Covid-19 is just like the flu" morons can just all get in the sea.  Yeah I support your right to free speech, but right back at you. You are scientifically illiterate, but not irredeemable. Like flat earthers.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
